text: #tinclude <string> using namespace std; int main () { string name, t; int age, namelen, posl, pos2; char cmd=" '; while (cmd!='Q"){ cout << "enter transaction ... "; getline (cin, t); cmd=t[0]; cout << "cmd = " << cmd << endl; if (emd=="A"){ posl=1; pos2=t.find("' ',posi+l); namelen=pos2-posl-1; name=t.substr(posl+1l,namelen); age=stoi(t.substr(pos2+1)); cout<<name<<" "<<age<<endl; } if (cmd=='D"){ posl=1; pos2=t.find("' ',posi+l); namelen=pos2-posl-1; name=t.substr(posl+1l,namelen); cout<<name<<endl; } } }
